transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hanji Rahul ji.
Customer: Ha sir, good morning.
Executive: Ha, main Sunny sir se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha ha sir aapka number tha maine apne abhi customer care pe call kiya hai abhi.
Executive: Ha maine kaha ye laga ke dekhe kisko lagta hai.
Customer: Are sir mere paas bhi call aata hai ye.
Executive: Chalo koi nahi koi nahi isse baat karte taklif nahi hai fir usse call lagao.
Customer: Mere pe to koi baat nahi bolo isme bhi nahi baat kar raha hu ispe.
Executive: Main keh raha fir aapne wo update kiya fir.
Customer: Kar diya hai, kar diya hai maine photo sara aapka update maine kar diya. Subah hi maine aaj baith ke kiya aapka jo photos ka bata rahe the na. Ye wala photos piche aa rahi jo. Photos ka maine sara update kiya hai. Aap chaho to check kar lo phone mein bhi. Sare jo main photo hai na front wale photo. Hmm hmm hmm. Usko sara maine sahi kiya hai. Main ye kuch karna nahi tha pehle se photo add tha purana wala bhi photo hai na aapka. To pehle se add tha pehle se par wo photo piche tha. To maine photo ko highlight kar diya upar ki main photo jo front wali photos hai na wo dikhe aapki.
Customer: Nahi wo to mere ko pata hai. Aur dusra maine kaha tha ki wo jo metal drum furniture tha wo jaise maine photo wagera nahi tha wo aapne add kar diya?
Executive: Hanji hanji usme dekho aap check karo aapne ye photo maine add kiya hai. Baki sab mein photos to lagbhag lagbhag sab mein add hai. Extra photo maine add nahi kiya hai. Ek do photos usme add kiya maine aapka. Nahi nahi matlab nahi nahi jo jo maine product add kiya tha jisme maine to maine photo dala tha maine information dali thi. Aapko kaha tha maine metal drum furniture wagera ho gaya inme inki photos hai nahi mere paas aap google se leke dal dijiye.
Executive: Aapne jo product add kiya na sabhi mein photos available hai. Koi product bhi bina photos ke hai hi nahi. Agar naya product add kar do to photos add kar dunga. Jaise wooden side board ho gaya restaurant bar sab mein photos hai total mein.
Customer: Chalo wo to koi nahi ab aapne isko isko. Ha naya product agar add. Kya bata rahe hai?
Customer: Aapne kuch study kiya usme kuch laga aapko kuch. Ha isme ha mapping ka tha sare mein se category mapping single single thi na sab mein maine double kiya aapka. Jaise aap dekh lo agar bone jaise bone inlet side board hai theek hai. Isme jo category hai bone inlet side board ki ek hi category map hai table ki ek hi category hai. To category mein double aapka kar de raha hu main taki by lead aapko aur aapko better ho jaye kyuki by lead aata hai primary mapping pe jo rehti hai. Agar double double mapping nahi hai to by lead aapke inquiry ka flow double double aayega aapke paas. Samjhe? Aap photos sare product mein aapke photos hai. Koi product aisa khali nahi hai ki jisme photos na ho. Ya koi naya product add karoge apne end se to aap add kar do photos main dal dunga koi badi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to koi nahi jo the wahi bas apne ye product hai ab wo ab main ye soch raha tha ye sab by lead aa rahi hai mere paas mein. Hmm hmm. Ye by lead sari do do teen teen piece wali aa rahi hai jo pehle dikat aati thi abhi bhi wo dikat aa rahi hai. Ab aap bataye in sabko main matlab irrelevant mark karu ya kya karu?
Executive: Irrelevant mark quantity ka issue usko by lead ko jo kam order wali quantity usko to consume mat karo usko hide kar do waha se usko. Kyuki us keyword se aa rahi hai by lead abhi. Aapko main bata raha hu suno abhi wo keyword jo added hai na uske karan by lead requirement aa rahi hai. Kyuki abhi buyer naye naye fir se jo listing restart hui hai to aapko by lead us type se aa rahi hai to usko not even mat mark karna usko hide kar dena quantity wale ko. Theek hai us hisab se kya hoga keyword se aani band ho jayegi fir usi hisab se aapke paas. Samjhe jaise abhi return gift pichwai manal ki aayi hai. Ye hai relevant aapki? Kya cheez? Ek by lead main dekh raha hu na return gift pichwai manai cake aayi hai 14 ghante pehle Chennai se. Ye product aur abhi bhi abhi bhi city listing bhi hame aur increase karna hai wahi panch hi bani rakhi hai listing increase nahi ho rahi hai. Dusra main aur by lead consume karke city listing. Ha. By lead listing panch hi consume kar raha hu. By lead ka. Dheere dheere dheere dheere main aapko bata raha hu are sir meri baat suno. Dheere dheere city listing increase hogi na tabhi by lead inquiry ka flow bhi aapka acha hote chala jayega. Abhi kitne din aapke ho gaye 26 20 19 August 20 matlab saat din aapke hue hai almost ek hafta hue hai abhi. Live hue. Nahi wo to theek hai tabhi to main by lead ka main apne kya naam hai Akshay karke use mein le raha hu daily jo mere kaam ki hoti hai wahi lunga na jabardasti. Ha nahi nahi ha wahi consume hi karna jo matlab irrelevant by lead ko kar raha irrelevant bhi koi aa rahi hai jo product related ekdam nahi hai. Wo aap mujhe batao wo by lead agar hai to aap mujhe share karo ki jo mere product related ekdam nahi hai. kar sakta kya abhi? Matlab wo product related nahi hai kya abhi reason kya hai reason to batao. Nahi nahi product related to hai bas wahi hai wo quantity wala issue aa raha hai. Usko consume mat karo usko hide kar do keyword ke karan fir bulk mein aani band ho jayegi na irrelevant agar mark karoge to reason aap se puchega ki kis reason se hai to aap dal do ki not dealing ke kya puchega reason. No no no ho jayegi na fir matlab mein dal dunga na I don't deal in low. Ha to. Ek kaam karo waha pe hide ka bhi option aa raha hai wo hide kar do aani band ho jayegi wo. Main nahi cha raha ki bade order bhi aane aapke paas ruk jaye. Ye dekhiye meri baat suniye main aapko bol deta hu dekhiye aapke samne kar raha hu theek hai metal 10 din mein jaane ke baad mein mere paas ek option aata hai I don't deal in low order value. Hmm hmm. Ha wo kar do. Par wo jo mang raha hai wo product sahi hai. Ye product jo kar raha hai wo product ha product sahi hai product sahi hai usko waha pe hide ka option nahi aa raha hide ka option dekho. Kyuki aani band ho jayegi na by lead jo order us category ki by lead aani band ho jati hai na. Filhal ke liye isko bhi hide kar. Hide ka option nahi aa raha. To not relevant kar do hide ka option agar kahin pe nahi available hai mere paas to laptop mein dikh rahi hai. Kyuki main nahi chahta ki bade order mein ha kar do fir. Chalo fir koi nahi fir aisa karte hai fir ek hafta aur dekhte hai chala ke. Hmm ek cheez rahi sir suno meri baat. Hmm agar naya product koi add kare to mujhe whatsapp pe de do add kare to batao photo mein kyuki sare product mein to photos hai aapke. Are sir main aapko keh raha hu dekhiye main koi ana suni suni mere paas main koi naya banda thodi hu nahi. Theek hai ek saal se India mart aapka chala raha hu aur main saal hi chala raha tha ek saal se. Hmm hmm. Theek hai to bas ha wo main renew nahi kar paya kuch reason thi mere. Abhi wahi to sir listing restart hui thi na listing ek bar band hoti hai to fir se mujhe restart karna hota hai aap ekdam se soch rahe ho. nahi wo sab to mere hone ka hai only for hafta 10 din le lo aap 15 din le lo aur to kya isse jyada kya time nahi main star wala maine star wala package liya koi matlab trust seal to maine liya nahi hai jo matlab dheeme dheeme dheeme dheeme upar aayega direct apne apne star hi liya direct upar hi aayega chalo koi nahi hafta 10 din le lo 15 din le lo. Koi na koi na main aapke mera to number hai na sir aapke paas main to aapko bol raha hu kahin bhi lagta hai direct mere paas hai bas aap ye kariye aap meri profile ko thoda na ache se apne rakhiye kaam aur jo bhi aapko lagta hai ki bhai yaha pe irrelevant mark hai ya fir ye product apne kya naam hai change karne ki chahiye iska naam sahi dala nahi hu sab aap mere ko batao. Main aapko whatsapp pe jaha pe lagta hai na main aapke whatsapp pe dalta hu main jaha pe requirement jaha pe lagti hai theek hai. To ab aap ek bar go through kariye mere catalog ache se aapne check kiya ache se catalog pura sare pe sare mein kholi rakha hu 12400 product maine aapka go through kiya hai. Jaha jaha pe category mapping waha pe maine double double mapping bhi kar di aapki hai jaise wooden double bed mein wooden double bed ki mapping thi to waha maine bhi mapping aapki double kar di teak wood bed ka mapping maine kar diya hai taki by lead ka flow sahi aur ho jaye. Aur catalog current catalog score aapka 87% hai jo ki usme koi increase karne ka hai nahi. Theek hai kya cheez? Current catalog quality score jo hai na 87% hai sir aapka. Ha 87% chal enough hota hai sahi bata raha hu main. 87% hai auto stock product pade hai metal drum furniture wale wooden tray wale use rakhna hai tray wala jo hai nahi rakhna hai sir main aapko wahi to keh raha hu iska aapne add kiya ki nahi kiya main yahi to aapke main wo inactive mein pade hai wahi to inactive mein pade hai wo auto stock mein pade hai aapke. Wo aapka auto stock ho gaye. Active aapne end se active kar do sare ko to. Ha ye sare active theek hai to aap bolo sare active auto stock mein to main nahi chahta yahi to yahi to main aap se puch raha hu photos hai ha to auto stock mein sir aap suno suno aapke end se auto stock mein ye sare the. Jaise wooden cabinet wo hai sare aapke end se auto stock the bina aapke permission stock nahi kar sakta tha na main nahi to kariye na sir aap aap mere ko aap mere ko naam bataye jo jo main bolu aap usko stock mein jo bhi hai designer glass lamps ho gaya designer metal handicraft ho gaya. Designer Designer metal handicraft designer glass lamps. Hata dijiye hata dijiye ye. Nahi rakhna ye dono ha dono hata dijiye deactivate kar dijiye. Deactivate mein deactivate mein hi hai. Ha to inko hata dijiye sir. Aapke end se sir deletion ke right aapke end se hota hai mere end se koi product deletion ka right nahi hai add kar chalo aapko ha aap aur product boliye. Designer glass lamp designer metal handicraft wooden balls designer metal lamps designer wooden handicraft stainless steel ice bucket. Designer wooden lamps sir ek bar apne end se go through karke jo deactivate mein usko activate aap kar lo apne end se to mere end se koi bhi delete karne ka right nahi hai tabhi main bata raha hu aapko deletion ka right aapke paas hi hota hai. Nahi hai mere ko kahan milega kahan jana padega mere ko product wale section mein jab deactivate lagaoge na sara product ka list aapko mil jayega. Meri baat suniye sir. Kya? Ye aapko wooden bowl dikh raha hai wooden tray dikh rahi hai wooden gift box dikh raha hai wooden cabinet dikh raha hai. usme agar agar lag raha hai na sir isme aap lag raha hai ki nahi deal kar rahe hai usko ya to deactivate kar do jisme kar rahe ho usko activate rakho total 132 product abhi activate usme. Deactivate kar do. Ha jisme nahi deal kar rahe ho usko deactivate kar do aap. Kyuki kabhi deletion ka right agar aap mujhe bolo ki ye delete kar do wo delete kar do deletion ka right mere paas nahi hota sir main koi product aapka delete nahi kar sakta aapka. Acha acha acha. Theek hai aap mujhe bolo delete kar do to main koi delete aap apne end se kar do aur main add karne bolo to main add kar dunga main kuch jo add karana hai photos bologe photos add kar dunga ye bologe wo add kar dunga delete kuch nahi karunga sir. To rukiye rukiye main fir aapko bata deta hu jo jo main jo jo hata raha hu main fir jo bachega wo hata doge aap jo bhi hata doge mere paas dikh jayega waha pe inactive aur active mein jo bhi aap karoge. Theek hai rukiye rukiye do minute line pe rahiye sir please.



Hanji sir dekhiye. Kya bol rahe ho? Ab dekhiye maine jo jo mere ko delete karna tha delete kar diya maine. Dekh leta hu zara fresh kar lete hai. Ye sab jo hai na apne active karna hai. abhi bhi abhi bhi che pade hai inactive mein. Ab ek product hata diya delete kar diya deactivate jo tha ab ye jo hai na ye sab mere ko delete karni hai ab aap inme ha isme karna wooden bada aaram se suno suno wooden ball set wooden ball mein karni hai na. Hmm hmm bilkul karni hai. Wooden tray bilkul wooden gift box wooden cabinet sab mein price to dal do kam se kam aap price to dal sakte ho na aap price dal do. Ab photos add kar dijiye main price photos main dal do. Chalo koi nahi ye kar do kyuki delete ka right mere paas hota nahi. Hmm hmm hmm. Nahi yaar photos photos main dal deta hu. Koi na fir iske liye iske liye aapko bolna ekdam nahi padega actually photo dalne mein main google se leke main dal de raha hu photos. To ache ache photos aap dal dijiye ache ache wale listing ache kar dijiye apni taki baad mein jo bhi hoga main dekh lunga koi taklif nahi hai theek hai na. Theek hai ab aur suno suno meri baat suno. Boliye boliye. By lead consumption thoda aur badhao fir by lead matlab out karni padegi by lead hume listing aur badhani hai usme. Samjhe? Fir minimum kitna kitna lead dena chahiye mere ko daily basis pe active raho ho jayega aapka aisa baat nahi hai ki chinta ka vishay ki by lead hamare paas nahi hai listing hame aur thodi badhani hai taki aapke paas inquiry ka flow bhi aur acha ho jaye. Nahi nahi theek hai lead chalo koi na main isko char panch char panch le raha hu main chalo koi nahi isko aur aur chalo flow badha dete hai 10 12 isme le leta hu. Chalo koi na meri number pe call karo sir call to mere paas hi aati hai ye wali. Aap actually mujhe call karo. main aise check kar raha tha maine kaha ye kiske paas jayegi bhaiya. Chalo koi na main ye concern mere paas open hua hai na iske liye main close karu to aapke paas feedback mail aayega lekin aapke paas theek hai. Isme aap kar dena customer care pe call kiya tha na aapne concern open hota hai mere paas mail ke through. Chalo theek hai aap kar dijiye main usko main kar dunga. Ha to usme aap yes karke kar dena theek hai. Theek theek theek aap isko thoda product add karke de dijiye main kar dunga na. Theek hai theek hai aapke paas bhi mail aayega feedback ke liye theek hai usme yes kar dena aap theek hai. Ha ha theek hai main kya karu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know how to handle irrelevant buyleads.

- Wants to add photos to metal drum furniture.

- City listing is not increasing.

- Wants to remove certain products from the listing.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested hiding low quantity buyleads.

- Executive confirmed photos are available for all products.

- Executive informed about category mapping.

- Executive guided on how to deactivate products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will go through the catalog and deactivate products.

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product listing, catalog, deactivation
